hero.title: EXPERIENCE THE STADIUM LIKE NEVER BEFORE:
hero.subtitle: feel the energy of the crowd.
hero.call: Join sports events in a unique way: choose your seat, take part in collective mosaics, and interact with other fans.

about.title: ABOUT THE APP:
about.text: Up is a pioneering platform that organizes and enhances the fan experience inside the stadium. More than just watching the game, each fan becomes part of a collective artwork: mosaics that come to life with the light from a flashlight or phone screen, all synchronized in real time.

how.title: HOW IT WORKS:
how.subtitle: Three simple steps to be part of the show

step1.title: 1. We detect your presence in the stadium

step2.title: 2. We sync your position with the mosaic
step2.description: The app calculates exactly when your phone should light up.

step3.title: 3. The stands turn into a spectacle
step3.description: Each fan helps form the image, team name or collective message.

benefits.title: BENEFITS AND DIFFERENTIALS:
benefits.subtitle: Why Up is unique in the sports world

card1.title: Automatic and synchronized mosaics
card1.description: Everything is organized by the app—no paper, no errors, no hassle.

card2.title: Geolocation technology
card2.description: Each fan is identified in their seat and becomes part of the show.

card3.title: Integrated social network
card3.description: Share photos and videos, post moments, and even publish directly to Instagram.

card4.title: Opportunities for sponsors
card4.description: Advertising spaces and exclusive activations inside the app.

card5.title: Innovation and pioneering spirit
card5.description: The first solution to combine collective experiences, social media, and fan data in one platform.

inspiration.text: THOUSANDS OF VOICES, ONE LIGHT: THE POWER OF UNITED FANS.

card1.name: Lucas Andrade
card1.feedback: I never thought my phone could be part of the stadium celebration. When I saw the mosaic taking shape, I felt like I was part of something bigger. It was exciting to take part in this collective experience.

card2.name: Mariana Costa
card2.feedback: Up brought innovation and excitement to our game. We managed to engage thousands of fans in a unique way, with no logistical complications and with an impressive visual impact.

card3.name: Ricardo Menezes
card3.feedback: With Up we managed to connect our brand directly to the emotion of the crowd. The reach and brand recall were far greater than any traditional action we had ever done in the stadium.

download.title: READY TO EXPERIENCE FANDOM IN A WHOLE NEW WAY?
download.subtitle: Imagine thousands of fans turning the stadium into a living mosaic, all connected through the same app. This is the revolution we are bringing.
